caption.p: Phenolic compounds removal (% w/ w) (-♦-) and color removal (%) (-■-), during growth of Yarrowia lipolytica strain ACA-DC 5029 on crude glycerol with initial concentration of ~70 g/L, blended with olive mill wastewaters offering initial phenolic compounds concentration of ~3.5 g/L. Culture conditions as described in Table 1. Each point is the mean value of two independent measurements.
